definitions.definition: The total , aggregate or sum of material ( not applicable to discrete numbers or units or items in standard English ) .
examples: The amount of atmospheric pollution threatens a health crisis.
Pour a small amount of water into the dish.
The dogs need different amounts of food.

definitions.definition: The number (the sum ) of elements in a set .

main_definition: The total , aggregate or sum of material ( not applicable to discrete numbers or units or items in standard English ) .
secondary_definitions: ( nonstandard , sometimes proscribed ) The number (the sum ) of elements in a set .
